# 1. Skmer1
```{r}
#/projects/mjolnir1/people/sjr729/Skmer_ms/Oedulis/skmer1/skmer1_library/distance_matrix.txt
d <- 0.0045823592325943685
k <- 31

# Compute theta
theta <- 1 - ( (55 / (6 - 36 * (1 - d)^k) + 17/6) )^( (6/11)*(1/k) )
theta

```
